summary: The code downloads the background music (bgm) file "the_happy_troll.mp3" and an image file "long_and_funny_image_about_ai_painting.jpg". It uses curl command with -L flag for redirecting, -O flag for saving output to named file. The music source is recognized by Shazam.

details.comment: The code downloads the background music (bgm) file "the_happy_troll.mp3" and an image file "long_and_funny_image_about_ai_painting.jpg". It uses curl command with -L flag for redirecting, -O flag for saving output to named file. The music source is recognized by Shazam.
details.content:
# first, let's download the bgm used by many funny videos, recognized by shazam
# curl -L -o the_happy_troll.mp3 "https://ge-sycdn.kuwo.cn/a573fcf0d69bd0cd5912bf9a96cff3dc/63b4a35f/resource/n3/1/70/3124049952.mp3"
curl -O "https://tmpfiles.org/dl/620815/long_and_funny_image_about_ai_painting.jpg"
